column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " I solved the question the same way I solved the challenges .
#Text=You have n't changed a bit .
#Text=Literally .
#Text=" Katara says : " Uh , over here !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Little help ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Jennamite is made of rock candy .
#Text=Delicious !
#Text=" Katara says : " So this crazy king is your old friend Bumi ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Who are you calling old ?
#Text=Okay , I 'm old .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Why did you do all of this instead of just telling Aang who you were ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " First of all , it 's pretty fun messing with people .
#Text=But I do have a reason .
#Text=Aang , you have a difficult task ahead .
#Text=The world has changed in the hundred years that you 've been gone .
#Text=It 's the duty of the Avatar to restore balance to the world by defeating Fire Lord Ozai .
#Text=You have much to learn .
#Text=You must master the four elements and confront the Fire Lord .
#Text=And when you do , I hope you will think like a mad genius .
#Text=And it looks like you 're in good hands .
#Text=You 'll need your friends to help defeat the Fire Nation .
#Text=And you 'll need Momo , too .
#Text=" Aang says : " Thank you for your wisdom , but before we leave , I have a challenge for you .
#Text="
